# make_window

make_window(_attack_name, _index, (value_name, value)... ) Source (opens new window)

Configure a window from a series of keys and values.

// Without Assistant
set_window_value(AT_BAIR, 1, AG_WINDOW_TYPE, 1)
set_window_value(AT_BAIR, 1, AG_WINDOW_LENGTH, 6)

// With Assistant
make_window(AT_BAIR, 1,
    AG_WINDOW_TYPE, 1,
    AG_WINDOW_LENGTH, 6
)


Parameters:

  • _attack_name: The attack index (opens new window) to be configured.
  • _index: int The index of the window to configure.
  • Any number of pairs of:
    • value_name: A window attack grid index (opens new window) to set.
    • value: The value to set to the paired window attack grid index.

See Also

  • make_attack: Configure an attack.
  • make_hitbox: Configure a hitbox.
Propose changes in github (opens new window)
